IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDE EDUCATION, ATHLETICS AND SOCIAL INTERACTION FOR STUDENTS IN GRADES 8-12.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PROVIDE EDUCATION, ATHLETICS AND SOCIAL INTERACTION FOR STUDENTS IN GRADES 8-12.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NOTES TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING STATEMENT: THE SCHOOL FOLLOWS FASB GUIDANCE FOR HOW UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS SHOULD BE RECOGNIZED, MEASURED, DISCLOSED AND PRESENTED IN THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THIS REQUIRES THE EVALUATION OF TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN THE COURSE OF PREPARING THE SCHOOL'S TAX RETURNS TO DETERMINE WHETHER THE TAX POSITIONS ARE "MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT" OF BEING SUSTAINED "WHEN CHALLENGED OR "WHEN EXAMINED" BY THE APPLICABLE TAX AUTHORITY. TAX POSITIONS NOT DEEMED TO MEET THE MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT THRESHOLD WOULD BE RECORDED AS A TAX EXPENSE AND LIABILITY IN THE CURRENT YEAR. MANAGEMENT EVALUATED THE SCHOOL'S TAX POSITIONS AND CONCLUDED THAT THE SCHOOL HAD TAKEN NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRE ADJUSTMENT TO THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS TO COMPLY WITH THE PROVISIONS OF ITS GUIDANCE.
ANNUAL ADVERTISEMENT IN LOCAL NEWSPAPER STATES NONDISCRIMINATION POLICY

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE VIRGINIA SMALL BUSINESS FINANCING AUTHORITY

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TRINITY EPISCOPAL SCHOOL USES MORGAN STANLEY TO RECEIVE ALL STOCK GIFTS WITH INSTRUCTIONS TO IMMEDIATELY SELL AND REMIT PROCEEDS DIRECTLY TO THE SCHOOL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BUSINESS MANAGER/TREASURER OF THE FINANCE COMMITTEE REVIEW THE 990 WITH FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO ITS ISSUANCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EVERY BOARD MEMBER SIGNS A "CERTIFICATE OF ACKNOWLEDGEMENT" STATING THAT THEY HAVE BEEN MADE AWARE AND UNDERSTAND THE SCHOOL'S POLICIES. TRANSACTIONS THAT INVOLVE A CURRENT BOARD MEMBER ARE EVALUATED BY THE BUSINESS MANAGER, HEADMASTER, AND BOARD OF OFFICERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEWS AND RECOMMENDS HEADMASTER COMPENSATION. ALL OTHER COMPENSATION IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY HEADMASTER AND BUSINESS MANAGER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COPIES OF AUDITED FINANCIALS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICIES, AND OTHER GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE PROVIDED UPON REQUEST.
